segments.text: If I remember correctly , time of delivery is another point in which we differ .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . Let's go into details of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . I hope you can have these goods delivered before the end of September . We'd like them to be ready in time for our Christmas sales .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Christmas doesn't come until the end of the year , does it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . But in the United States , the Christmas season begins about a month before December 25 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'm afraid a little bit difficult for us to advanced the time of shipment . Our manufacturers are fully committed at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you can try to get them to step up production .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are already working three shifts a day to step up production as new orders keep pouring in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If that's the case , there's nothing to be done about it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's your last word as to the delivery date then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the middle of October . This is the best we can do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I'll take your words at that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Let's call it a deal . And we'll do our best to advance the shipment , but your letter of credit should be opened early September .
segments.speaker: S2
